mapper.select: SELECT c.USER_ID AS userId, c.ITEM_ID AS itemId, c.AMOUNT AS amount, s.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, s.PRICE AS price, i.AMOUNT AS stockAmount, i.UUID AS uuid FROM CART c JOIN SHOP s ON c.ITEM_ID = s.ITEM_ID JOIN INVENTORY i ON s.STOR_ID = i.STOR_ID WHERE c.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE USER_ID = #{param1} AND ITEM_ID = #{param2}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS (STATUS, ADDRESS, PHONE, USER_ID) VALUES (#{status}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{userId})

INSERT INTO ORDER_AMOUNT (ORDER_ID, ITEM_ID, AMOUNT, UNIT_PRICE) SELECT #{orderId} AS ORDER_ID, c.ITEM_ID, c.AMOUNT, s.PRICE AS UNIT_PRICE FROM CART c JOIN SHOP s ON c.ITEM_ID = s.ITEM_ID WHERE c.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.ITEM_ID AS itemId, c.AMOUNT AS amount, s.PRICE AS price, i.AMOUNT AS stockAmount, s.STOR_ID AS storId FROM CART c JOIN SHOP s ON c.ITEM_ID = s.ITEM_ID JOIN INVENTORY i ON s.STOR_ID = i.STOR_ID WHERE c.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADDRESS (ADDRESS, ADD_NAME, USER_ID) VALUES (#{address}, #{addName}, #{userId})
